    • Uses of Timer in action

      Methods in action with parameters of type Timer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void DiscreteActionDependent.addDependence​(java.lang.Object o, java.lang.String depentMethodName, Timer timerDependence)
      Add a discret action in the tree dependentActions
      Constructors in action with parameters of type Timer 
      Constructor Description
      DiscreteAction​(java.lang.Object o, java.lang.String m, Timer timmer)
      Construct a discrete action
      DiscreteActionDependent​(java.lang.Object o, java.lang.String baseMethodName, Timer timerBase)
      Construct a series of dependent actions, first action (method) called is baseMethodName, then method nextMethod() is called to select the next action.
      DiscreteActionOnOffDependent​(java.lang.Object o, java.lang.String on, Timer timerOn, java.lang.String off, Timer timerOff)
      DiscreteActionDependantOnOff is the class that allows the creation and the management of a serie (TreeSet) of discrete actions with an On Off dependence : first action (method) called is On, then method nextAction() is called to select the next action.
